channel.title: PI Trade Dupe
channel.description:
Hey, working on a new server and i came across this dupe that happens through trade.... Server is PI 317
1) Player A trades player B an item, and accepts both screens. 2) Player A clicks anywhere after the trade has completed and gets item back. 3) Player B also gets the item which was traded....
Here's a GIF of the trade in action
[url=http://gyazo.com/51120d33eea71f2dac232eae96a813a9]http://gyazo.com/51120d33eea71f2dac232eae96a813a9[/url]

item.title: PI Trade Dupe
item.dc:creator: @thejoshpro thejoshpro
item.description:
@thejoshpro wrote:

Trade works and dupe is fixed but items disappearing when trade is declined

Read full topic

item.title: PI Trade Dupe
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

Again, have the removal and adding in the same operation. Do not add/remove anything without doing the opposite on the other side. And of course check if the trade is valid.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Trade Dupe
item.dc:creator: @thejoshpro thejoshpro
item.description:
@thejoshpro wrote:

I have fixed the dupe, the problem now is:
player a trades over item
Player b does not receive it.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Trade Dupe
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

The problem seems to be that the trade is going through, however it’s not telling the server that the trade is finished when they both accept. Wherever that is handled is where you should look first.

Edit: When you walk, it is declining the already accepted trade, so it gives back the traded items.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Trade Dupe
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

This problem has nothing to do with movement. Make sure that you do not add any items for one of the players without removing it from the other player.

Read full topic

item.title: PI Trade Dupe
item.dc:creator: @TaverlyPS TaverlyPS
item.description:
@TaverlyPS wrote:

Block movement if in a trade? Or have it decline the trade if any movement is done while trading?

Read full topic

Hey, working on a new server and i came across this dupe that happens through trade… Server is PI 317

  1. Player A trades player B an item, and accepts both screens.
